Información

Administrador Web

Es un sistema para la administración de objetos inteligentes que facilita el ingreso de los objetos inteligentes con su target y su interfaz.
Es desarrollado con Node-RED, API utilizado para la comunicación con objetos inteligentes y Neo4j, base de datos no relacional escalable.

name: interface.html
template:
Administrador Web - Interfaz - {{payload.object}}   Regresar

Carpeta de Objetos

Puedes arrastrar y soltar sus archivos de interfaz en cualquier parte de esta ventana. Asegúrese de que index.html sea su punto de inicio.

            Añadir Achivos de Interfaz

name: target.html
template:
Administrador Web - Target - {{payload.object}}   Regresar

1. Iniciar sesión en Vuforia Target Manager.
2. Subir la imagen del target en formato .jpg
3. Crear o abrir una Base de datos en Vuforia.
4. Crear un target en Vuforia con el mismo nombre de la imagen del target.
5. Asegúrese de activar el target.
6. Descargue la Base de datos y luego subirla aqui:
(Puedes arrastrar y soltar el archivo en cualquier parte de la área con lineas diagonales)
Subir la base de datos .zip y la imagen .jpg

name: ajax.js

query: create (d:Device {code:{code}, model:{model}, type:{type}, protocol:{protocol}, ip:{ip}, puerto:{puerto}, COM:{COM}, online:{online}, target:{target}, trackable:{trackable}}) RETURN d

name: Verify
MODIFY
query: match (d:Device) where d.code={code} set d.model={model},d.type={type},d.protocol={protocol},d.ip={ip},d.puerto={puerto},d.COM={COM},d.online={online},d.target={target},d.trackable={trackable}  RETURN d

name: Map ADD
importación css y js pagina principal

query: MATCH (d:Device{code:{dev}}),(o:Object{code:{obj}}) MERGE (d)-[r:HAVE]->(o) RETURN r

query: MATCH (d:Device {code: {code}}) OPTIONAL MATCH (d)-[r]-() DELETE d, r

name: Map DELETE

NEW NODE
query: create (o:Object {code:{code}, name:{name}, type:{type}, element:{element}, protocol:{protocol}, x:{x}, y:{y}, src:{src}}) RETURN o

name: Verify
MODIFY
query: match (o:Object) where o.code={code} set o.name={name},o.type={type},o.element={element},o.protocol={protocol},o.x={x},o.y={y},o.src={src} RETURN o

name: Map ADD
INFO NODE
query: MATCH (o:Object) RETURN o

name: DELETE NODE
query: MATCH (o:Object {code: {code}}) OPTIONAL MATCH (o)-[r]-() DELETE o, r

name: Map DELETE
Map MODIFY
MODIFY NODE
query: MATCH (d:Device { code:{code}})-[r]->(o:Object) set o.src={src} RETURN o;

name: RESPONSE
NEW NODE
query: create (a:Action {code:{code}, Description:{Description}, Type:{Type}, x:{x}, y:{y}, src:{src}})  RETURN a

name: Verify
MODIFY
query: match (a:Action) where a.code={code} set a.Description={Description},a.Type={Type},a.x={x},a.y={y},a.src={src} RETURN a

name: Map ADD
INFO NODE
query: MATCH (a:Action) RETURN a

name: DELETE NODE
query: MATCH (a:Action {code: {code}}) OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[r]-() DELETE a, r

name: Map DELETE
Map MODIFY
MODIFY NODE
query: MATCH (d:Device { code:{code}})-[r]->(o)-[r1]->(a:Action) set a.src={src} RETURN a;

name: RESPONSE
Map LINK
LINK SC
query: MATCH (o:Object{code:{obj}}),(a:Action{code:{act}}) MERGE (o)-[r:HAVE]->(a) RETURN r

name: Map LINK
LOAD NODE
query: USING PERIODIC COMMIT LOAD CSV WITH HEADERS FROM "http://127.0.0.1:1880/database/csv" AS row WITH row, COLLECT(row.d_model) AS d_model, COLLECT(row.d_type) AS d_type, COLLECT(row.d_protocol) AS d_protocol, COLLECT(row.d_ip) AS d_ip, COLLECT(row.d_puerto) AS d_puerto, COLLECT(row.d_COM) AS d_COM, COLLECT(row.d_online) AS d_online, COLLECT(row.d_target) AS d_target, COLLECT(row.d_trackable) AS d_trackable, COLLECT(row.o_name) AS o_name, COLLECT(row.o_type) AS o_type, COLLECT(row.o_element) AS o_element, COLLECT(row.o_protocol) AS o_protocol, COLLECT(row.o_x) AS o_x, COLLECT(row.o_y) AS o_y, COLLECT(row.o_src) AS o_src, COLLECT(row.a_Description) AS a_Description, COLLECT(row.a_Type) AS a_Type, COLLECT(row.a_x) AS a_x, COLLECT(row.a_y) AS a_y, COLLECT(row.a_src) AS a_src MERGE (d:Device {code:row.d_code}) ON CREATE SET d.model = d_model,d.type = d_type,d.protocol = d_protocol,d.ip = d_ip,d.puerto = d_puerto,d.COM = d_COM, d.online = d_online,d.target = d_target,d.trackable = d_trackable FOREACH (x IN CASE WHEN row.o_code IS NULL THEN [] ELSE [1] END | 	MERGE (o:Object {code:row.o_code}) 	ON CREATE SET o.name = o_name,o.type = o_type,o.element = o_element,o.protocol = o_protocol,o.x = o_x,o.y = o_y,o.src = o_src  	MERGE (d)-[:HAVE]->(o) 	FOREACH (y IN CASE WHEN row.a_code IS NULL THEN [] ELSE [1] END | 		MERGE (a:Action {code: row.a_code}) 		ON CREATE SET a.Description = a_Description,a.Type = a_Type,a.x = a_x,a.y = a_y,a.src = a_src 		MERGE (o)-[:HAVE]->(a) 	) )

name: UNLOAD NODE
query: MATCH (d:Device) OPTIONAL MATCH (d:Device)-[r:HAVE]->(o:Object) OPTIONAL MATCH (d:Device)-[r:HAVE]->(o:Object)-[r1:HAVE]->(a:Action) RETURN d.code AS d_code, d.model AS d_model, d.type AS d_type, d.protocol AS d_protocol, d.ip AS d_ip, d.puerto AS d_puerto, d.COM AS d_COM, d.online AS d_online, d.target AS d_target, d.trackable AS d_trackable, o.code AS o_code, o.name AS o_name, o.type AS o_type, o.element AS o_element, o.protocol AS o_protocol, o.x AS o_x, o.y AS o_y, o.src AS o_src, a.code AS a_code, a.Description AS a_Description, a.Type AS a_Type, a.x AS a_x, a.y AS a_y, a.src AS a_src
